title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Hi, happy to join the group!

MacBook will suddenly not charge when it's turned on.
If I shut it down, it charges normally (orange led, goes green when full).
After I turn it on it keeps the green led on until OSX starts up, then the light goes off.

It didn't work with the battery, it had a green flashing LED. I found a problem on the PPBus that was on the Q7130. I changed and the PPBus was normal. But with the problem of only charging off.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Check exact resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of ISL6259.
Post PPBUS_G3H voltage w/ and w/o battery.
Is the battery recognized and its percentage correctly showed by macOS?

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Thank you friend!

Pins 17/18 - 3ohms
Pins 27/28 - 20 ohms
PPBus without battery - 12.56
PPBus with battery - starts at 11.8 and goes up to 12.56
PPBus with running system, without LED - 11.5

I noticed that when the system comes in, the LED goes out, the charger only works again if I take it out of the socket and put it back in again.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
I forgot.

Yes, the system recognizes the battery and shows the percentage.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Magsafe light is not related with macOS.
Try known good DCIN board.
Also test with another 85W Magsafe 2 charger and fake charger, or lab PSU  too.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
I've tried it with another DCIN and another 85w magsafe 2, same thing.

I don't have a fake charger! with the PSU, it's recognized! With the system working, I place the original and it works. If I restart the mac, the original stops working!

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message: Change Q7180...

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
I had already tried the Q7180, but I took it from another logic. I'll try another one!

I give news!

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message: D7010 is another suspect...

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
I switched Q7180 and D7010, apparently solved.

Now I'm trying to solve problem with display's BKL! I did something stupid that the F7700 opened! even after switching, it did not give BKL.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
F7700 burnt again?
Do you get image at least?

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
F7700 did not open again. I have an image, I can see it with the light on the apple.

I'm checking the component connections.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message: Post D7701 voltages; LCD connected, of course.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
BKL is back. But strangely, if the Mac goes to sleep, the BKL doesn't come back.

With BKL working: P1 - 7.2v / P2 - 45.6v
When it runs out of BKL, 0v pins

Anything bad soldering? I will keep checking this and give feedback.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Do you mean sleep closing the lid, or even software sleep?
Do PRAM reset 2-3 times.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
in both! If you let it go to rest or close the lid, the BKL will not come back.

Had already tried reset PRAM.

Problem with charging returned! Crazy logic! I'll keep checking the welds.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Known good Magsafe 2 charger?
Also try known good battery...

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Yes, I tested it with 2 magsafe 2 85w original.

also tested with two batteries

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message: Known good batteries, or new chinese?

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message: Original batteries. Both in good condition.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message: Test again with PSU, or fake charger.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
with PSU works.

That's the smallest problem, I'm trying to solve the BKL problem. Continue to stop when it goes to sleep or turns off and on.

Trying to buy the U7701 and U7750 to test.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Both problems may be related.
Make the machine works with original Magsafe 2 charger first.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message: Friend, thanks for the attention so far. I ordered the components and I'm waiting for them to arrive.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
I received the new Q7180, the problem remains.

With PSU the Mac recognizes the charger. With the original, it only recognizes with mac turned off.

Any tips?

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Post now U7100 voltages; pins 1, 2, 3, 9, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 19, 20, 27.
When the charger is not recognized...

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
I'm back to mac work.

Checked pin voltages, no battery connected.
1: 0
2: 20v
3: 4.5v
9:0
12: 3.3v
13: 3v
14: 2.27v
15:0
17: 12.56v
19: 5.45v
20: 5.45v
27: 0

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
"27: 0"
Are you sure?
If yes, check R7121/22 and their traces.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Sorry, I was wrong.

Pin 27: 19.76v

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message: Was these voltages taken when the charger is not recognized?

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Recognized! I will try to simulate the problem off the board.

normally stops recognizing with the system turned on and battery connected.

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
Take the voltages at that time.
What do you expect to find, if charger is recognized?

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message:
I noticed that the logic doesn't present the problem when it's alone, only with the battery and SSD.

I was testing putting it in the topcase and connecting the other items. It seems like when I plug in the trackpad, that's when the problem happens. Tried with another trackpad, and same problem. I'm checking it out!

title: 820-3662 battery only charges when off
message: Crazy logic!!! After being well without the trackpad for hours, now it's back to the problem. I will try to measure the voltage of the U7100 when I am having the problem.
